name: UISceneConfiguration
desc: Information about the objects and storyboard for UKit to use when creating a particular scene.

items.name: init(name: String?, sessionRole: UISceneSession.Role)
items.desc: Creates a scene-configuration object with the specified role and app-specific name.

items.name: var sceneClass: AnyClass?
items.desc: The class of the scene object that you want UIKit to create.

items.name: var delegateClass: AnyClass?
items.desc: The class of the custom delegate object that you want UIKit to create.

items.name: var storyboard: UIStoryboard?
items.desc: The storyboard object that contains your scene's initial view controller.

items.name: var name: String?
items.desc: The app-specific name assigned to the scene configuration.

items.name: var role: UISceneSession.Role
items.desc: The role assigned to the scene configuration.

items.name: struct UISceneSession.Role
items.desc: Constants that indicate the possible roles for a scene.
